skill_name: Removing visual noise in the neural network's response

usage_example.python:
from anthropic import Anthropic

client = Anthropic()

message = client.messages.create(
    model="claude-sonnet-4-20250514",
    max_tokens=4096,
    system="""You are a tool for cleaning text of visual and symbolic clutter.
You receive a text overloaded with ...""",
    messages=[
        {"role": "user", "content": "Your message here"}
    ]
)
print(message.content[0].text)
